title: Suomi Type Foundry fonts now in MyFonts
content:
First three fonts from Suomi Type Foundry are now available from MyFonts:  
Tee Franklin family:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016211659im_/http:/typophile.com/files/stf_TeeFranklin_poster_6126.png)

Tang family:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016211659im_/http:/typophile.com/files/stf_Tang_poster_6288.png)

Tubby:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016211659im_/http:/typophile.com/files/stf_Tubby_poster_5419.png)

More to come.
author: Tomi from Suomi
